Title: Gamma World, Part 2
Director: Sebastian Montes, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Joshua Fine (story), Michael Ryan, Christopher Yost (story)
Actors: Brian Bloom, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Eric Loomis, Chris Cox
Plot: It's up to Hawkeye, the Hulk, and Thor to save the day when the Leader's gamma radiation ray mutates the rest of the Avengers and threatens to do the same to every human on earth.
